entry.title: Thursday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning early this morning then changing to rain or drizzle near noon and ending this afternoon. Fog patches late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:34 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
